message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $150 is a bit high for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product.
I understand that $130 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $118 for the product.
I understand that $125 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $122.
I'm getting close to my budget, Alice. I'm willing to pay $119 for the product.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $121.
I'm really close to my budget, Alice. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product.
